EmailTemplate.name: MPW-AcceptCustomerFormByCEXPRESS
EmailTemplate.subject: Your MPW reservation form {!MPW_Reservation__c.Name} for {!MPW_Reservation__c.Customer_Company_Name__c} in {!MPW_Reservation__c.MPW_Train_Name__c} has been accepted by MPW Tapeo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your MPW reservation form {!MPW_Reservation__c.Name} for {!MPW_Reservation__c.Customer_Company_Name__c} in {!MPW_Reservation__c.MPW_Train_Name__c} has been accepted.
Please take note on the following steps:
* CDRS and Product Design Review shall be submitted by GLOBALFOUNDRIES Field Applications Engineer to Customer Engineering immediately. * Design Rules Check requests can be submitted to GLOBALFOUNDRIES immediately. DRC requests must be submitted at least 2 weeks before the tapeout date. * If IP merge is required, the request must be submitted at least 2 weeks before the tapeout date. * Quotation must be raised before Quotation Close (28 days after Reservation Close date)
Please review it. {!MPW_Reservation__c.Link}
